metadataAttributes.Title: FPGA Capstone:  Building FPGA Projects
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course will give you hands-on FPGA design experience that uses all the concepts and skills you have developed up to now.   You will need to purchase a DE10-Lite development kit.  You will setup and test the MAX10 DE10-Lite board using the FPGA design tool Quartus Prime and the System Builder.
